Modernizing GSA Technology.


The Office of the CTO utilizes collaborative practices and modern IT tools to facilitate a new GSA.

Share technology

Most technology implementations have repetitive components. We strive to find a balance between defining reusable, resellable services and creating a diverse ecosystem of technology.

Make small bets

From investment to implementation, we will help organizations and programs pilot and prototype before making investments in scaling out their solutions.

Modernize and innovate

GSA is seen as the first mover of technology in the federal government. To succeed in this role, we continually explore new technologies and exit outdated ones.

Be open

We promote open source and open data throughout GSA, engaging and informing citizens.

 

Users come first

We ensure that users have direct impact on our products as we continuously deliver them.
